skills.title: Quality Assurance Student
skills.description: Gained in-depth knowledge in Quality Assurance, including manual testing, API testing, and automation testing. Applied this expertise to real projects by collaborating with a team to develop and enhance mobile and web applications, ensuring high-quality standards and effective testing processes.

skills.title: Data Analyst Intern
skills.description: Developed Reporting Services and Power BI Dashboards; analyzed data with Python and SQL. Ensured data accuracy through cleaning and processing, and utilized visualization techniques to present insights and trends, supporting data-driven decisions.

skills.title: Machine Learning of Bangkit Academy 2023
skills.description: Acquired in-depth knowledge in Machine Learning with Python and TensorFlow. Developed skills in SQL, Spreadsheets, and Python Pandas for data analysis. Completed a Capstone Project, demonstrating expertise in application development and product validation.

skills.title: Assistant Lecturer of Mathematics Courses
skills.description: Mentored students to improve problem-solving, critical thinking, and academic readiness. Skilled in teaching discrete mathematics principles in computer science, providing students with a solid mathematical foundation for success in the field.

portfolio.title: Connect Mobile App & Web
portfolio.description: Development of mobile banking applications and websites shown to blind friends, so that they can carry out banking activities better.

portfolio.title: Baliguide Capstone Project
portfolio.description: Mobile app that offers recommendations to tourists to find hotels, cafes, and tourist attractions based on their preferences.

portfolio.title: MBKM Website Development
portfolio.description: A website that helps students and lecturers in the selection, decisions and administrative processes before registering for MBKM.
